member.name: T:PeerReview.ATM.HardwareDrivers.CardReader_Model234.CardReaderModel234Driver
member.summary: A hardware driver to the card reader device

member.name: M:PeerReview.ATM.HardwareDrivers.CardReader_Model234.CardReaderModel234Driver.Authenticate(System.Int32)
member.summary: Authenticates the card with a PIN
member.exception: When there is no inserted card
member.returns: true - if the PIN matches the card, otherwise false

member.name: M:PeerReview.ATM.HardwareDrivers.CardReader_Model234.CardReaderModel234Driver.EatCard
member.exception: When there is no inserted card

member.name: M:PeerReview.ATM.HardwareDrivers.CardReader_Model234.CardReaderModel234Driver.EjectCard
member.exception: When there is no inserted card

member.name: M:PeerReview.ATM.HardwareDrivers.CardReader_Model234.CardReaderModel234Driver.InsertCard(PeerReview.ATM.HardwareDrivers.Interfaces.Cards.Card)
member.summary: Inserts a card into the ATM
member.exception: When there is already an inserted card

member.name: M:PeerReview.ATM.HardwareDrivers.CardReader_Model234.CardReaderModel234Driver.ReadAccountNumber(System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads the account number of the card
member.exception: When there is no inserted card
member.returns: The account number associated with the card
